greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n^3 + sum((-1)^j*a(j)); for j=1 to n-1; a(1)=1.
comment: 1 followed by interleaving of A154105 and 3*A154106. - _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
formula: a(n) = 3n^2 - 3n + 1 if n is 1 or an even number;
a(n) = 9n^2 - 21n + 15 if n is any odd number other than 1. (End)
program: (MAGMA) S:=[ 1 ]; for n in [2..45] do Append(~S, n^3 + &+[ (-1)^j*S[j]: j in [1..n-1] ]); end for; S; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
xref: The third of a family of sequences that includes A153284 and A153285.
results.author: _Walter Carlini_, Dec 23 2008, Jan 01 2009
ext: Extended beyond a(30) by _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 04 2009
